availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John William Walker (Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of George Walker and Elizabeth Walker. Married to Evaline Jane Hastings on April 12, 1863. Father of Belle Walker. Farmer in Bracken County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District 1, p. 183.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Augusta, p. 264B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Ohio, Clermont County, Monroe Township, p. 173D.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, File # 000344094, Bracken County, April 12, 1863, p. 333-34 (accessed via ancestry.com).
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Bracken County, KY, June and July 1863 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
